short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reload the page with added query params, so to load with new cache

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
So, here issue is when you are working on any website and you are observing same data on every reload. Its because of cache and cookies website are storing to provide you better and fast experience.

But sometimes, we need to have refreshed/latest content on every reload of page. 

So here our extension comes in picture.
